mapper.select: select user_id as userId , password as password , user_type_id as userType from user WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT d.user_type_id as userType , b.menu_auth_name as menuAuthName FROM menu a INNER JOIN menu_authority b ON b.menu_id = a.menu_id INNER JOIN user_type_menu_authority c ON c.menu_authority_id = b.menu_authority_id INNER JOIN user_type_auth d ON d.user_type_id = c.user_type_id INNER JOIN user e ON e.user_type_id = d.user_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND e.USER_ID = #{userId} and e.password = #{password}
